docs.title: ssh from another machine
docs.text:
Edit /etc/ssh/sshd_config. 

Port 2222
AddressFamily any
ListenAddress 0.0.0.0
ListenAddress ::
PasswordAuthentication yes
Add a Hyper-V firewall rule to allow inbound traffic to WSL to the SSH port. New-NetFirewallHyperVRule -DisplayName "allow WSL ssh" -Direction Inbound -LocalPorts 22 -Action Allow

Restar ssh as: sudo service ssh --full-restart

ssh localhost -p 2222 should work now.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Plain codeblock
docs.text:
A plain codeblock

Some code here
def myfunction()
// some comment

docs.title: Code for a specific language
docs.text:
Some more code with the 'py' at the start;

import tensorflow as tf
def whatever()
